summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 TOYOTA SIENNA. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS); HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO REMEDY THE VEHICLE WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. JOSEPH AIRPORT TOYOTA (LOCATED AT 1180 W. NATIONAL RD, VANDALIA, OH 45377 (937-898-8060)) WAS CONTACTED ABOUT REPAIRING THE VEHICLE. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE PARTS WERE ONLY AVAILABLE FOR VEHICLES LOCATED IN ZONE B. THE MANUFACTURER WAS ALSO CONTACTED AND THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WAS A POSSIBILITY OF RECEIVING A LOANER VEHICLE; HOWEVER, THE OFFER WAS NOT CARRIED OUT. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
